comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: Wyastone Leys (note the spelling) is a country house in Hereford, although its nearest town is Monmouth it is over the border on the English side of the river Wye. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wyastone_Leys

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Thanks for the background information and the correct spelling.  We'll update the source data.
